>From: "Kenneth Stanley" <kstanley@...>
>
>Hey John, I really like the topology/offpsring (species)
>visualization.  That's really interesting.

But MURDER on my server! :)

>It would be really cool
>also if you could also view the current champ topology and what it
>does.  (as of you haven't already done enough!)

It's planned.  But here's why I'm in no hurry:

The fitness range is 0 to 144.  1 represents ability to do a 1/9th 
reduction.  144 represents ability to do a 16x enlargement.  It's based on 
how big of a pixel area the output is.  I could explain it in detail if you 
cared, but the bottom line is, it's got to reach a fitness of 137 before it 
is actually performing 2x enlargement.  Its current fitness of around 60 
means it can (accurately) reduce to a little less than 0.2x.  It's got a 
LONG way to go before it is of any interest to me.  But on the bright side, 
it's getting there.  And faster than I was afraid it would, which is good.

Unless I get bored and do it before then, I'll implement those features once 
it reaches a fitness of around 125.
